string.text: Enable if you have Body Health System addon installed and want to have sway penalties from BHS. This will use Weapon Sway addon when arms are above BHS arm penalties. \n \n You can disable patch even when BHS installed, this will overwrite BHS and use only Weapon Sway addon all the time.
Changes keybind for the hold breath feature.
Animation type of weapon sway. Currently only have first two, all "custom_" are empty and are there for people to add their own.
Animation type of weapon sway with scope. List same as above.
Maximum power that camera effect can reach, combined from all other factors. \n \n Default: 3
Multiplier for weight of the gun (gun_weight * Weight_Factor). \n \n Default: 1.0
Maximum power that weight multiplier can reach, the heavier gun the more multiplier for camera effect is. \n \n Default: 7

Effect multiplier for stand/walk body states. 
 
 Default: 1.2 
 
 (Stand_Power * gun_weight * Weight_Factor * 0.1)

Effect multiplier for crouch body state. 
 
 Default: 0.8 
 
 (Crouch_Power * gun_weight * Weight_Factor * 0.1)

Effect multiplier for low crouch body state. 
 
 Default: 0.4 
 
 (Low_Crouch_Power * gun_weight * Weight_Factor * 0.1)

Effect multiplier for stand/walk body states if weapon has scope. 
 
 Default: 1.2 
 
 (Scope_Stand_Power * gun_weight * Weight_Factor * 0.02)

Effect multiplier for crouch body state if weapon has scope. 
 
 Default: 0.8 
 
 (Scope_Crouch_Power * gun_weight * Weight_Factor * 0.02)

Effect multiplier for low crouch body state if weapon has scope. 
 
 Default: 0.4 
 
 (Scope_Low_Crouch_Power * gun_weight * Weight_Factor * 0.02)

Effect multiplier for low crouch body state if weapon has scope. 
 
 Default: 0.4 
 
 (Scope_Low_Crouch_Power * gun_weight * Weight_Factor * 0.02)
A feature that allows you to put a gun on an obstacle infront of you to reduce weapon sway.
Reduction multiplier of weapon sway when it's mounted. \n \n Default: 0.1
This one is a bit complicated, just reduce even more if you want a weapon to still considered "mounted" when you raise it higher. \n \n Default: -0.35
Allows you to hold breath by holding "Use" key while aiming and decrease weapon sway for limited amount of time.
(constant) Multiplier for weapon sway reduction while holding your breath. \n \n Default: 0.1
(1 + this_value * seconds_hold) Penalty multiplier that you get after releasing "Use" key or if hit max timer. \n \n Default: 0.04
Maximum amount of time that you can hold your breath for (in seconds). \n \n Default: 11
Multiplier for breath restore, a value of "1" means that breath will restore at the same speed as decreasing. \n \n Default: 0.5

Range of handling weapon stat multiplier: 
 
 Increasing this value will result in: bad handlings = bigger penalties; good handlings = bigger bonuses. 
 
 Decreasing is: bad handlings = less penalties, good handlings = less bonuses, "0" = handlings do not affect sway. 
 
 Default: 1

Debug allows you to see: 
 
 1. Direction and changed y-axis direction (in console) 
 
 2. Difference in distance between cursor and raycast with edited "y" (in dynamic news) 
 
 3. Power of animation camera effect (actor messages at the bottom)
